target_markets.market_description: Property management companies and landlords managing rental properties

target_markets.market_description: Businesses needing customer service, sales, and appointment scheduling automation

problems_validated.problem: Poor voice AI agent experiences that sound robotic and provide horrible customer service
problems_validated.current_solutions: Traditional call centers, basic IVR systems, poorly configured voice bots
problems_validated.market_gap: Voice agents now sound like human beings but most are still poorly set up

problems_validated.problem: Property management tenant support is inefficient and creates poor tenant experience
problems_validated.severity: High - affects tenant satisfaction and operational costs
problems_validated.current_solutions: Manual phone lines, basic ticketing systems
problems_validated.market_gap: No intelligent classification of urgent vs non-urgent issues with automated workflows
